column2: A dwarf warrior has arrived at your court.
A dwarf steward has arrived at your court.
An elf spy has arrived at your court.
An elf lass has arrived at your court.
A halfling steward has arrived at your court.
A halfling diplomat has arrived at your court.
A gnomish spy has arrived at your court.
A gnomish thinker has arrived at your court.
It seems that my kindness toward dwarf folk has come to the attention to a dwarf within the realm. We met and shared a few drinks and had a great time.
It seems that my respect toward the old elven culture has come to the attention to an elf within the realm. We met and had the most enlightening discussion.
It seems that my fondness toward the halfling way of life has come to the attention to a halfling within the realm. We met and had the most delicious of feasts.

It seems that my courtesy and respect towards the gnomes of my realm have come to the attention of a certain gnome. We met and played a game of dice, discussing various inventions the gnome brought along.
